title: Russian Military Leaders Discussed Use of Nuclear Weapons, US Officials Say
description: The conversations alarmed the Biden administration because they showed how frustrated Moscow had become over its battlefield setbacks in Ukraine.
dc:creator: Helene Cooper, Julian E. Barnes and Eric Schmitt
media:credit: Jim Huylebroek for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian soldiers on the Kherson front. Since Russia invaded Ukraine in February and suffered significant casualties, President Vladimir V. Putin has fanned fears that he might resort to a nuclear weapon.
